overview: Sexy, naive Mikki Finn is looking to be discovered. But nothing back home could have prepared this pretty young songwriter for the sordid adventure she would find in Hollywood. Nestor Lewis is the record industry's most prominent producer (and the biggest dick). But nothing in his career could have prepared HIM for Mikki Finn! Mikki has written a song for recording star Ecstasy, rock's hottest nympho. Lewis steals Mikki's song and plans to use it on Ecstasy's next album. When tantalizing Mikki discovers what the horny Mr. Lewis is up to, she employs all of her sexual talents to regain what is rightfully hers... and now the fun begins.
title: The Adventures of Mikki Finn
